task_data.title: BUG FIX: Dashboard admin page event log purge button failing with error 'Failed to purge event log: Failed to purge event log'. User reports purge functionality not working. Investigate dashboard API endpoint, backend purge logic in dashboard server, file permissions on coordination/dashboard-events.jsonl, and error handling. Fix the purge functionality and add proper error messages to help debug future issues.
